T02TD2398E:25a-1: h'um ka ra tsitta bindu bha ba na kra ma /
T02TD2398E:25a-3: sems nyid kyi thig le h'um nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2398E:25a-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2398E:25a-5: rdo rje nyi zla'i steng du ni //
T02TD2398E:25a-6: de steng rin chen 'od byed pas //
T02TD2398E:25a-7: padma'i kha ni dbye bar byed //
T02TD2398E:25a-8: mdzes ma lha mdzes btsun mo kye //
T02TD2398E:25a-9: padma'i tshal ni btang ba yis //
T02TD2398E:25a-10: gzhan na yon tan ci zhig yod //
T02TD2398E:25a-11: sems kyi bung ba ge sar la //
T02TD2398E:25a-12: khu ba dag ni 'thung bar byed //
T02TD2398E:25a-14: mi rgod lnga dang me tshogs bzhi //
T02TD2398E:25a-15: de lnga mnan te thog tu gnas //
T02TD2398E:25a-16: dga' ba'i gzhu ni bkang byas nas //
T02TD2398E:25a-17: mda' ni bde ba chen por brgyab //
T02TD2398E:25a-18: sems kyi bung ba ge sar la //
T02TD2398E:25b-1: bung ba mo la 'di skad smra //
T02TD2398E:25b-2: smras kyang go bar mi byed dam //
T02TD2398E:25b-4: bde ba chen po'i khu ba 'di //
T02TD2398E:25b-5: 'thungs zhing sgra skad sgrogs par byed //
T02TD2398E:25b-6: bde dang sdug bsngal grong khyer gnyis //
T02TD2398E:25b-7: mtshams na bdud rtsi'i rdzing bu gnas //
T02TD2398E:25b-8: de ru chu 'thung mi byed pa'i //
T02TD2398E:25b-9: yon tan med pa'i bud ba khyod //
T02TD2398E:25b-10: sems kyi bung ba ge sar ni //
T02TD2398E:25b-11: khu ba dag ni 'thung bar byed //
T02TD2398E:25b-13: stong nyid zhags pa chen po yis //
T02TD2398E:25b-14: sems kyi rgyal po bcing bar bya //
T02TD2398E:25b-15: bde gshegs lnga ni bsdam byas nas //
T02TD2398E:25b-16: gcig tu mgo la bkur byas te //
T02TD2398E:25b-17: bde bas gar ni byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2398E:25b-18: sems nyid kyi thig le'i h'um nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dz'a landha ras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
